attributes.action: Reduce red light jumping by removing the amber traffic light when going from red to green
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Removal of the amber traffic light when going from red to green will stop drivers from moving off on an amber light when there is the potential for a motorist crossing on the opposing lights at the same time on an amber light prior to a red light. This is standard in Ireland and a number of other european countries.
